title: Primož Roglič Under Pressure to Salvage Red Bull Season at Giro d’Italia: ‘He Can Turn Everything Around’
content:
Roglič rides into Giro-Tour double with Pogačar as a reference and pressure to paper over Bora-Bull's miserable spring: ‘You get inspiration when you see what’s possible.’

Read the full article at Primož Roglič Under Pressure to Salvage Red Bull Season at Giro d’Italia: ‘He Can Turn Everything Around’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
